price: que mi Señor me perdonó mis faltas y me honró [con la bienaventuranza]!"
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
